ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A series of additional Tcl commands and Tk widgets with style and various functions (under Windows: DDE exchange, access to the registry and icon manipulation) to supplement the tcltk package
A series of additional Tcl commands and Tk widgets with style and various functions (under Windows: DDE exchange, access to the registry and icon manipulation) to supplement the tcltk package

name: r-tcltk2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tcltk2
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/tcltk2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/tcltk2/tcltk2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dc1cc00ce973df1ce98b830aa70998e455119d89961ce9a368e8a688e6845c6a

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('tcltk2')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('tcltk2')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.sciviews.org/SciViews-R
  license: LGPL-3.0-only
  summary: 'A series of additional Tcl commands and Tk widgets with style and various functions (under Windows: DDE exchange, access to the registry and icon manipulation) to supplement the tcltk package'
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-3'
    - LICENSE.note

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ArneKr
    - FrodePedersen
    - MathiasHaudgaard

# Package: tcltk2
# Type: Package
# Version: 1.2-11
# Date: 2014-12-19
# Title: Tcl/Tk Additions
# Author: Philippe Grosjean [aut, cre]
# Authors@R: c(person("Philippe", "Grosjean", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "phgrosjean@sciviews.org"))
# Maintainer: Philippe Grosjean <phgrosjean@sciviews.org>
# Depends: R (>= 2.8.0), tcltk
# Suggests: utils
# SystemRequirements: Tcl/Tk (>= 8.5), Tktable (>= 2.9, optional)
# Description: A series of additional Tcl commands and Tk widgets with style and various functions (under Windows: DDE exchange, access to the registry and icon manipulation) to supplement the tcltk package
# License: LGPL-3 + file LICENSE
# URL: http://www.sciviews.org/SciViews-R
# BugReports: https://r-forge.r-project.org/tracker/?group_id=194
# Packaged: 2014-12-19 16:32:30 UTC; phgrosjean
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2014-12-20 10:35:06
